r.s: A utility to send HTTP status line
r.d: Stagehand_HTTP_Status is a utility which can be used to send a HTTP status line from a status code for the current HTTP response.
r.n:
A new release of Stagehand_HTTP_Status is now available.
What's New in Stagehand_HTTP_Status 1.1.0
* API changes: Stagehand_HTTP_Status::send() has been changed to static method and so as to receive the status code as an argument.
